Title: Prohibits the eviction of tenants for using medical marihuana for a certified medical use
Summary: Prohibits the eviction of tenants for using medical marihuana for a certified medical use.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to prohibiting the eviction of tenants for the certified medical use of medical marihuana
